content: At these last words, Pinocchio jumped up in a fury, took a hammer from the bench, and threw it with all his strength at the Talking Cricket.
translations: ita:A queste ultime parole, Pinocchio saltò su come una furia, prese un martello dalla panchina e lo gettò con tutte le sue
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
